verses.verse: Elihu <S%H453><s%> also <S%H3254>proceeded,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Suffer <S%H3803><s%> me a <S%H2191>little,<s%> and I will <S%H2331>show<s%> thee <S%H3588>that<s%> I have <S%H5750>yet<s%> to <S%H4405>speak<s%> on <S%H433>God's<s%> behalf.
I will <S%H5375>fetch<s%> my <S%H1843>knowledge<s%> from <S%H4480>afar,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and will <S%H5414>ascribe<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to my <S%H6466>Maker.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H551>truly<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H8267>false:<s%> he that is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H3524>mighty,<s%> and <S%H3988>despiseth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> any: he is <S%H3524>mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>strength<s%> and <S%H3820>wisdom.<s%>
He preserveth not the <S%H2421>life<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> but <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor.<s%>

He <S%H1639>withdraweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H4480>righteous:<s%> <S%H6662><s%> but <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> are they on the <S%H3678>throne;<s%> yea, he doth <S%H3427>establish<s%> them <S%H5331>forever,<s%> and they are <S%H1361>exalted.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> they be <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>fetters,<s%> and be <S%H3920>holden<s%> in <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction;<s%>
Then he <S%H5046>showeth<s%> them their <S%H6467>work,<s%> and their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they have <S%H1396>exceeded.<s%>
He <S%H1540>openeth<s%> also their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> and <S%H559>commandeth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they <S%H7725>return<s%> from <S%H4480>iniquity.<s%> <S%H205><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> they <S%H8085>obey<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, they shall <S%H3615>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>prosperity,<s%> and their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H5273>pleasures.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> they shall <S%H5674>perish<s%> by the <S%H7973>sword,<s%> and they shall <S%H1478>die<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
But the <S%H2611>hypocrites<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> heap <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H639>wrath:<s%> they <S%H7768>cry<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H631>bindeth<s%> them.
They <S%H5315><s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H5290>youth,<s%> and their <S%H2416>life<s%> is among the <S%H6945>unclean.<s%>
He <S%H2502>delivereth<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> in his <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and <S%H1540>openeth<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%> in <S%H3906>oppression.<s%>

Even <S%H637>so<s%> would he have <S%H5496>removed<s%> thee out of the <S%H4480>strait<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H6862><s%> into a broad <S%H7338>place,<s%> <S%H8478>where<s%> there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4164>straitness;<s%> and that which should be <S%H5183>set<s%> on thy <S%H7979>table<s%> should be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1880>fatness.<s%>
But thou hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H1779>judgment<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> <S%H1779>judgment<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> take <S%H8551>hold<s%> on thee.

Because <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> beware <S%H6435>lest<s%> he take thee <S%H5496>away<s%> with his <S%H5607>stroke:<s%> then a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3724>ransom<s%> <S%H408>cannot<s%> <S%H5186>deliver<s%> thee.
Will he <S%H6186>esteem<s%> thy <S%H7769>riches?<s%> no, <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1222>gold,<s%> nor <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3981>forces<s%> of <S%H3581>strength.<s%>
Desire <S%H7602><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H3915>night,<s%> when <S%H5971>people<s%> are cut <S%H5927>off<s%> in their <S%H8478>place.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed,<s%> regard <S%H6437>not<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H205>iniquity:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> hast thou <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H4480>affliction.<s%> <S%H6040><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7682>exalteth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3384>teacheth<s%> like <S%H3644>him?<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H6485>enjoined<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him his <S%H1870>way?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H559>say,<s%> Thou hast <S%H6466>wrought<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity?<s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H7679>magnify<s%> his <S%H6467>work,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7789>behold.<s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> may <S%H2372>see<s%> it; <S%H582>man<s%> may <S%H5027>behold<s%> it afar <S%H4480>off.<s%> <S%H7350><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7689>great,<s%> and we <S%H3045>know<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> can the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H8141>years<s%> be searched <S%H2714>out.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he maketh <S%H1639>small<s%> the <S%H5198>drops<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> they pour <S%H2212>down<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> according to the <S%H108>vapor<s%> thereof:
Which <S%H834><s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> do <S%H5140>drop<s%> and <S%H7491>distill<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly.<s%>
Also <S%H637><s%> <S%H518><s%> can any <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4666>spreadings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> or the <S%H8663>noise<s%> of his <S%H5521>tabernacle?<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he <S%H6566>spreadeth<s%> his <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H8328>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> by them <S%H1777>judgeth<s%> he the <S%H5971>people;<s%> he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> in <S%H4342>abundance.<s%>
With <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3709>clouds<s%> he <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H216>light;<s%> and <S%H6680>commandeth<s%> it not to shine <S%H5921>by<s%> the cloud that cometh <S%H6293>between.<s%>
The <S%H7452>noise<s%> thereof <S%H5046>showeth<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> it, the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5927>vapor.<s%>
